==Chinese==
{{zh-see|米國}}

----

==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|べい|こく|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
The second kanji character in {{m|ja|亜米利加||America|tr=America}} + {{m|ja|国||country|tr=koku}}. The reason the second character is used instead of the first is because {{m|ja|亜}} is already in use as the abbreviation for {{m|ja|亜細亜||Asia|tr=Ajia}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|べいこく|accent=h|yomi=on|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|べいこく|proper|kyu=米國}}

# the [[United States of America]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-l|アメリカ||America}}
